sqlMap.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS WRK_COUNT FROM ORD_DEF_WH_UPLD_WRK ODW WHERE ODW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ODW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND ODW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ODW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM

SELECT ODW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM ,ODW.DEF_WH_MAP_TMPL_CD ,ODW.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_DESC_TXT ,ODW.THIRD_PTY_ITEM_FLG ,ODW.FROM_POST_CD ,ODW.TO_POST_CD ,ODW.ON_HND_CHK_FLG ,ODW.OTBD_PRIM_ON_HND_CHK_WH_CD ,ODW.OTBD_PRIM_ON_HND_CHK_SWH_NM ,ODW.OTBD_PRIM_ON_HND_LIN_SRC_NM ,ODW.OTBD_SCD_ON_HND_CHK_WH_CD ,ODW.OTBD_SCD_ON_HND_CHK_SWH_NM ,ODW.OTBD_SCD_ON_HND_LINE_SRC_NM ,ODW.OTBD_DEF_WH_CD ,ODW.OTBD_DEF_SWH_NM ,ODW.OTBD_DEF_LINE_SRC_NM
FROM ORD_DEF_WH_UPLD_WRK ODW WHERE ODW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ODW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND ODW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ODW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM

SELECT MICT.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_CD FROM MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP MICT WHERE MICT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MICT.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_DESC_TXT = #mdseItemClsTpDescTxt# AND MICT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY MICT.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_CD
SELECT '1' FROM RTL_WH RW WHERE RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RW.PHYS_WH_CD = #physWhCd# AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT S.RTL_SWH_CD FROM SWH S WHERE S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND S.RTL_SWH_NM = #rtlSwhNm# AND S.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY S.RTL_SWH_CD

SELECT OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CD ,OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CATG_CD FROM ORD_LINE_SRC OLS WHERE OLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_NM = #ordLineSrcNm# AND OLS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CD

SELECT WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM ,WRK.FROM_POST_CD ,WRK.TO_POST_CD FROM ORD_DEF_WH_UPLD_WRK WRK WHERE WRK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND WRK.DEF_WH_MAP_TMPL_CD = #defWhMapTmplCd# AND WRK.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_DESC_TXT = #mdseItemClsTpDescTxt# AND WRK.THIRD_PTY_ITEM_FLG = #thirdPtyItemFlg# AND WRK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM

SELECT ODW.FROM_POST_CD ,ODW.TO_POST_CD FROM ORD_DEF_WH ODW WHERE ODW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ODW.DEF_WH_MAP_TMPL_CD = #defWhMapTmplCd# AND ODW.MDSE_ITEM_CLS_TP_CD = #mdseItemClsTpCd# AND ODW.THIRD_PTY_ITEM_FLG = #thirdPtyItemFlg# AND ODW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ODW.FROM_POST_CD ,ODW.TO_POST_CD
